values.value: Capstan Hoist mount systems must be compatible by manufacturer's requirements, labeled with WLL to industry standards, and all hardware must be present and tight. ANSI A10.48 requires proof testing of vehicle-anchored hoists to 150% of max load Capstan - mount system labeled with WLL, proper hardware utilized for anchorage Winch - All bolted frame connections are tight, welded connections free of cracks or other defects. ANSI A10.48 (13.6.1)
Is the hoist mounted properly and securely according to manufacturers' requirements, and proof tested to ANSI A10.48 requirements?
